__e: Well, if it's any consolation, I don't like myself very much right now, either.
Besides a consolation kiss, I don't see what] can do.

Yeah, I may have just told you I love you, and I probably should have told you that before you were stood here, in the middle of a field, on the way to marry my brother but um... if it's any consolation, I literally only just realised that myself.
My only consolation is that this may finally make you understand that you don't belong here.
We can only take comfort in the fact that she is in a better place now than she found here among us.
We're in trouble. The good thing is, you're in more trouble than we are.
The only solace for any of us is that... if Charlie were here, he'd be laughing himself silly.
I thought it was a consolation to know that he was here.
Don't you tell me what I'm thinking. You're just as normal as I am, if that's any consolation to you.
Have you ever felt like there's no solace in anything? . Have you ever felt like there's no solace in anything?
"And it is comfort in our pain... you are now together again."
There is a comfort about being amongst people like yourself.
My only consolation was, when I went upstairs to sleep, that mom would come to give me a kiss, when I lay in bed.
- If it's any consolation, when my uncle Roy was dying -- - What, you told her I was DYING?
The warmth of the life inside me... it gave strength and comfort, when all seemed lost.
When I am dead, each of you will have the sweet consolation of returning to Europe,
If you're looking for the silver lining, you called me. Ten years ago, you never would have done that.
But I'll never forgive myself for not revealing myself, for not at least giving you the consolation of knowing... there is something else.
